title: President summons NA, Senate sessions on Wednesday
content:
ISLAMABAD, Feb 14 (APP): President Dr Arif Alvi on Tuesday summoned the National Assembly and Senate to meet on February 15 (Wednesday).
According to a President House statement, the National Assembly will meet at 1530 hours and Senate at 1630 hours at the Parliament House.
The president summoned the sessions of both Houses exercising his powers under Article 54 (1) of the Constitution.
